## Star History

**The missing star history graph of GitHub repos.**

[![ref-repo]](https://github.com/star-history/star-history)
[![ref-online-tool]](https://www.star-history.com)
[![ref-official-doc]](https://www.star-history.com/blog/how-to-use-github-star-history)

### Parameters

<details >
<summary><small>Click to show/close parameters</small></summary><p></p>

| Name | Type | Required | Default | Description | More Description |
| -------------------- | -------------------- | ------------------------ | ----------------------- | --------------------------- | ------------------------------- |
| ![ref-querys] | | | | | |
| `repos` | `string` | `true` |  | Repository name | Multiple repository names separated by `,`, such as: `owner1/repo1,owner2/repo2`. |
| `type` | `string` |  |  | Display type | Supported: `Date` `Timeline`. |

</details>

```txt
https://api.star-history.com/svg{?repos,type}
```

<p align="right"><a href="#readme-top"><img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Back%20to%20top-555555?style=for-the-badge"></a></p>

### Examples

```markdown
<!-- star-history/star-history -->
![Star History Chart](https://api.star-history.com/svg?repos=star-history/star-history&type=Date)
```

<div>
  <img src="https://api.star-history.com/svg?repos=star-history/star-history&#38;type=Date" alt="Star History Chart" />
</div>
